Property Development Services

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ disabled_on=”on|off|off” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”3.25″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” make_fullwidth=”on” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.2)” text_font_size=”10vw” text_line_height=”1em” quote_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” custom_margin=”||-0.4em|” custom_padding=”|||” filter_blur=”7px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_duration=”10000ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”40%” animation_speed_curve=”linear”]

PROPERTY

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″ custom_padding=”||28px|||” collapsed=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

PROPERTY DEVELOPMENT SERVICES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

EWL Developments is the specialist property development division of EWL which specialises in infrastructure, new build, refurbishment and small-scale renovations of properties and buildings. EWL Developments is managed by three partners, all of whom have more than 20 years’ experience in Finance, Design and Construction of Civil Engineering and Building Projects. Following successful project management of Railway Infrastructure and Property projects EWL has been able to diversify into a Property Developer, and also specialise in re- development of Listed Buildings. We have good relationships with English Heritage, Railway Heritage and Conservation Trusts.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-13.jpg” title_text=”EWL-13″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

EWL CAR PARK DIVISION

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

As a subdivision of our Development team EWL has developed a large portfolio of car parks, helping our clients from inception and feasibility stage to design, construction and operation stage. Our services include the following:

  • Project Management and specialist Car Park advice to all clients.
  • Design, Build, Finance and Operate (DBFO) of car park projects.
  • Specialist Modular Products on each multi storey car park we undertake.
  • Refurbishment of existing car parks.
  • Green/Sustainable /Carbon Free advice.

Details of our full capability statements can be downloaded on the following LINK

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

EWL DEVELOPMENT SERVICES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

We are able to provide all the essential services required to undertake any successful development project, including but not limited to the following:

  • Identify suitable development sites
  • Prepare development appraisals
  • Prepare financial appraisal
  • Secure funding
  • Manage the development process from start to finish

Details of our full capability statements can be downloaded on the following LINK

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ next_background_color=”#515553″ admin_label=”footer-ewl(cabecera)” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ bottom_divider_style=”asymmetric2″ locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_module=”740″][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”footer-ewl” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#515553″ min_height=”470px” custom_padding=”27px|||||” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_module=”730″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ custom_padding=”|||”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-Logo-3-copia.png” title_text=”EWL Logo 3 copia” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”UK” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”23px” body_font=”Open Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#a5a5a5″ body_font_size=”17px” body_line_height=”1.3em”]
